    • Student

      public Student(int id, String surname, String forename, LocalDate birthDate, Integer[] majors)
      Instantiates a Student object.
      Parameters:
      id - student ID number
      surname - student surname
      forename - name of forename
      birthDate - birthDate in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
      majors - integers representing student majors list

  • Method Details

    • majorsMenu

      public static String majorsMenu()
      Returns a string of all majors in the Student.MAJORS list. Use for input menus. Formatted as " 3: Math"
      Returns:
      the majors.

    • majorsStringToList

      public static Integer[] majorsStringToList(String string)
      Converts a string of the form "2,3,6" to an array of Integer objects, [2, 3, 6]. Used when reading Student objects from a file.
      Parameters:
      string - The string to convert to an array.
      Returns:
      The array version of string.

    • key

      public String key()
      Creates a formatted string of Student key data in the format "surname, forename, id". Ex: "Brown, David, 123456".
      Returns:
      a Student key as a string

    • majorsListToNames

      public String majorsListToNames()
      Converts a list of major integers to a string of major names.
      Returns:
      comma delimited string of major names based upon the current student object's integer majors list. e.g.: [0, 2] returns "science fiction, drama"
